ARN.description: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic `Ref` function, Ref returns the ARN of the parameter group, such as `arn:aws:memorydb:us-east-1:123456789012:parametergroup/my-parameter-group`

description: Specifies a new MemoryDB parameter group. A parameter group is a collection of parameters and their values that are applied to all of the nodes in any cluster . For more information, see [Configuring engine parameters using parameter groups](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/memorydb/latest/devguide/parametergroups.html) .

Description.description: A description of the parameter group.

Family.description: The name of the parameter group family that this parameter group is compatible with.

ParameterGroupName.description: The name of the parameter group.

Parameters.description: Returns the detailed parameter list for the parameter group.

Tags.description:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

For more information, see [Tag](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-resource-tags.html) .
